title: Hardwood Floors, Ceiling Fan, Wi-Fi with Lounge Area
posting_body: LaVita Apartments in Dallas, TexasAt LaVita on Lovers Lane you have the benefit of the suburbs and the convenience of the city.
Fifteen minutes to the heart of Dallas where you will find amazing museums, sports, concerts, shopping, and restaurants.
Within minutes from home, you will find new shopping developments that include Aldi, Target, numerous stores and restaurants.

LaVita offers studio to two bedroom homes that feature remote-controlled ceiling fans in each bedroom and living room, stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops, tile flooring, and spacious closets.

Our community has a stunning pool with a waterfall feature (open seasonally), a dog park with a dog wash station, a spacious clubhouse with full kitchen, a game room with foosball and poker tables, and a well-equipped fitness center for all your workout needs!
Make your appointment today and come see your new home!
Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183
